body.name: 9x12 Area Rugs for Living Room Machine Washable Rug Distressed Indoor Carpet Neutral Moroccan Boho Rug Ultra Soft Area Rug for Bedroom Dining Room Playroom Office
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 21 hrs 55 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: Decorative Living Room Rugs: This area rug grounds your indoor space in a bohemian-inspired print. It features rows of various geometric patterns in cream and grey hues, and it's purposefully distressed for a vintage feel.

Durable & Comfortable Rug: These area rugs are skillfully made from premium polyester making them highly stain resistant, fading resisitant and non-shedding, ideal for any area in your home. Fluffy surface feels softer bring you more comfortable and warmer experience during your relaxing time.

Non Slip Rug: Nonslip rug with TPR backing, guarantee stability. This area rug always stay in place, no need to pay for an extra rug pad. Ensure the safety of you and your family to the greatest extent.

Kids & Pets Friendly Rug: This area rug designed with resilience against everyday wear and tear, kid and pet-friendly rug and perfect for high-traffic areas of your home such as the living room, dining room, playroom.

Easy to Maintain: To care for this washable rug, vacuum it without a beater bar regularly and spot-clean it as needed. You can also put the rug into the washing machine with cold water and dry without heat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, pretty and machine washable for a home with kids and dogs!
reviews.reviewText: Just washed this for the first time, all the stains came out. It is relatively thin but I expected that, but very soft. All the kids love it and spend a ton of time on it. Stays in place well even in a high traffic area. Only wish it had matching runners. Love the soft neutral colors, makes the room appear larger.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, soft, and durable rug that honestly surprised us
reviews.reviewText: We have two cats that love to tear up carpeting, rugs, and upholstered furniture. We got this rug because a) it looked like it would fit the decor, but b) more importantly, it seemed like it wouldn't attract their claws. We put it in the center of our bedroom (currently painted concrete floor) under our king-size bed, and so far, it's been great. Our bed is upholstered and they've scratched the cr@p out of it, even now that it's on top of the rug, and they've stretched and tried to dig their claws into this rug, but they haven't actively scratched the rug yet, so I'd call that a success.We'd like to buy this rug in more sizes in this pattern for our bedroom, because it's very pretty.Oh, in case you're wondering, it arrives folded in plastic packaging, like a sealed bag. You just unfold the rug where you want it and it settles eventually.I highly recommend this rug, in the blue and white pattern. It's beautiful and very easy to manage. I haven't had to clean a spill up, yet, but it vacuums easily.The only thing I'd caution is that it feels a bit slippery on socked feet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a great quality rug and the price is great! It’s very soft too. Nice a light but also durable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great area rug
reviews.reviewText: This was the perfect small rug for my living room. Its very soft and easy to clean (which was important to me since we have a couple dogs). We have hardwood flooring and other rugs have slid all over it but this one stays pretty well in place! I would highly recommend this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is the perfect rug for our living room! It’s completely non-slip and super soft. We’ve already cleaned it once - it easily fit in our washer and we let it air dry. It cleaned perfectly like new!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It looks great. Holds up well against dogs, babies, vacuum cleaners. It is a touch slippery because it's so smooth. Otherwise it is a great rug for the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft rug, super easy to clean!
reviews.reviewText: This is the perfect rug for our guest room. We got the 8x10 and it fits the area beautifully. It's soft under foot and is super easy to clean. Our dog tracked a bit of mud in and we didn't notice until it was dried. We were able to vacuum up the dirt easily and dabbed out the rest with a wet cloth. No leftover stain. Rug looks good as new. Would definitely recommend if your looking for a solid area rug at a great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's machine washable!!
reviews.reviewText: This rug is exactly what I have been looking for! It stays flat and doesn't roll up. It's not fluffy or thick but it's comfortable. It's light enough to carry upstairs to wash but heavy enough to look expensive. lolI was hestiant about the color because I two very active kids under 5yrs old and 3 small dogs. The color is AMAZING BTW! I took a chance because it says it's machine washable. I have a full size front loader and it fits. I've washed it THREE times already and it looks like new every single time. The bottom doesn't peel or lose it's shape (like other rugs). I run it in a regular cycle with oxy clean and tide pods. Then, let it air dry over the stair rail. My guests love it and my neighbor asked to share the link for it. I am EXTREMELY impressed with this rug. I can't recommend it enough! For reference, I bought the 8x10.
